1626190.name: Incarnation: A God Reborn
1626190.description:
Incarnation: A God Reborn is a third-person action role playing game, uncovering the mystery of Adriel through his journey in the soul scape. Darkness has taken over the world in the form of miasma and it's up to you to stop it. Set in a fictional world inspired by Native American cultures, you will journey through multiple different zones/biomes and experience new enemies, fight your way through dungeons, solving puzzles, and uncovering locked memories about who you are and what you are capable of.


Combat
Players will be able to fight using 5 different affinity classes that are bound to proprietary weapon types. You have the freedom to choose your favorite weapons that will unlock abilities to wreak havoc upon your enemies. Affinities are elemental based stances that allow you to use the power of Land, Sea, Sky, Sun and Moon to counter your enemies' affinities. Although you can play whatever you want, strategy is best formed by fighting against the disadvantaged affinity.


Exploration
The Soul Scape encapsulates 5 different and unique biomes to capture the vast world of Incarnation. These biomes host main and side quests to tell narrative stories and give insight on Native American lore. These biomes also have exploration factors to encourage the player in their journey by finding things like interactive prayer circles, monuments, and other interactions that give you player agency.
1626190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
